root.name: Anarchy Online: Shadowlands
root.description: The Shadowlands is an expansion for the MMO Anarchy Online. The Shadowlands or SL for short, launched in the summer of 2003. The Shadowlands expansion introduced two completely new areas. The city in the sky, Jobe, and the fantasy themed land of, you guessed it, the Shadowlands.Features:Level cap Increased from 200 to 220 Two new proffesions, Shade and Keeper Introduction of the Perks system Over 150 new dungeons Thousands of new items New Nano abilities Faster Leveling JobeThe city of Jobe is located above Rubi-Ka. It is broken down into 4 sections, The main platform, The Market, The Harbor, and The Plaza. Each Section has a portal to either Elysium or Nascence. In the Jobe Market IPS building, you can find the inventor Arul Saba. He will sell you some of the components to make the damage adding Arul Saba Bracers. ShadowlandsThe Shadowlands are broken down into 7 playfields. Nascence, Elysium, Scheol, Adonis, Penumbra, Inferno, and Pandemonium. Each having a different theme, be it fire, snow, water. As you progress through the different each has slightly higher level monsters than the last, Nascence being the lowest, and Pandemonium being the highest.
